# File lib/json/editor.rb, line 1164
1164:       def store_file(path)
1165:         if path
1166:           data = Editor.model2data(@treeview.model.iter_first)
1167:           File.open(path + '.tmp', 'wb') do |output|
1168:             if @options_menu.pretty_item.active?
1169:               output.puts JSON.pretty_generate(data)
1170:             else
1171:               output.write JSON.unparse(data)
1172:             end
1173:           end
1174:           File.rename path + '.tmp', path
1175:           @filename = path
1176:           toplevel.display_status("Saved data to '#@filename'.")
1177:           unchange
1178:         end
1179:       rescue SystemCallError => e
1180:         Editor.error_dialog(self, "Failed to store JSON file: #{e}!")
1181:       end
